ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.controller
Class BitController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.controller.BitController

@Controller
public class BitController
extends Object

The Spring Controller that intercepts all the URL patterns related to Bits. Each function passes the specified jsp page name through the View Resolver to render it for the user

Author:
Jeffrey Payan, Stephen Kidson
